name: Yeti Rambler 26 Straw Cup
description: Pairing the over-engineered Rambler tumbler with the environmental-consciousness of a reusable straw, you get minimal sloshiness and maximum slurpiness with your favourite teas, smoothies or plain ol' water.18/8 stainless steel with double-wall vacuum insulation.Rugged DuraCoat™ finish won't peel, crack or fade.Straw Lid with spill-resistant design.Clear lid lets you see when you need a refill.
